text: viśvāsavantayini! (dānamāna kirīmaṭa adahas kaḷahot) oba harihambha kaḷa dæyenda, api obaṭa bhūmiyehi ikut kaḷa (dhānya, palaturu ādī) dæyenda, hon̆da dæyama (dānamānaya vaśayen) viyadam karanu. ēvāyen narak vū dæya dīmaṭa kæmati novanu. (mandayat narak vū bhāṇḍa obaṭa keneku labā dunnahot) ēvā oba (piḷikulen yutuva) æs piyavī giya aya vaśayen misa, labā gannē næta! (ebævin oba kæmati novana bhāṇḍa an ayaṭa dānamānaya vaśayen nodenu). niyata vaśayenma allāh vastuva avaśya novanneku hā imahat praśaṁsāvaṭa ayat keneku vaśayen siṭinnēya yanna oba sthīra vaśayen dæna ganu
